Rumbo a casa presents you with this magnificent, unique and comfortable duplex in Brunete of 225m2 of housing (ALL M2 REGISTERED AND DEEDED) spread over a first floor of 100.70 m2, with a wonderful terrace of 60.45 m2, upper floor with attics of 63.67 m2.This magnificent home also has a 25 m2 storage room next to a 12 m2 garage space. If you are looking for the tranquility and nature of the outskirts RUMBO A CASA presents a magnificent duplex located about 28 km.from the capital, 5 km.north of Villanueva de la Cañada, 12km.east of Boadilla del Monte 9 km.south of Villaviciosa de Odón and 9 km.west of Quijorna. ITS DISTRIBUTION This splendid home offers you the comfort of an apartment and the size and privacy of a chalet.It has 225m2 spread over two floors and stands out for how bright it is throughout the day since each of its rooms are exterior and has large windows in all rooms. We enter the house from a first floor of 101 m2 + 60m2 terrace, which has a hall from which we can see the access to the rooms on the first floor.To the left we have a good-sized room with a two-door built-in wardrobe.To the right we enter the kitchen which has two parts, the office with the washing machine, refrigerator and storage area, with large space on the countertops.Next we have the entire comfortable and functional kitchen area with counter space and storage area, in this part of the kitchen there is access to a bright 60m terrace, ideal for enjoying the outdoors, with a barbecue and a lot of privacy since the Adjacent buildings do not exceed two heights.We continue down the hallway and find a very spacious full bathroom.To the right we find the master bedroom with a built-in wardrobe with two double doors and a complete bathroom with a bathtub and two sinks.At the end we enter a large living room with access to a separate terrace and also to the 60m terrace, the blinds in the living room are electric. All the windows are double and those in the two bathrooms on this floor are also tilt-and-turn. We go up to the upper floor via beautiful and bright stairs (these stairs also offer us a storage space).This 64 m2 floor offers us cozy and warm spaces thanks to its sloping ceilings covered in wood.This part of the house offers us a double bedroom with double windows, three single bedrooms with VELUX windows, a dressing room and a bathroom with a VELUX window. The heating is natural gas, the hot water boiler is new and it has air conditioning on both floors. The house has a 12m2 garage space and a 25m2 warehouse. DESCRIPTION OF YOUR SITUATION Brunete is an ideal place to enjoy the surroundings as it has more than 900 hectares of protected green areas.Surrounded by the tributaries of the Alberche and Guadarrama. TRANSPORTATION AND ROADS Brunete has an extensive bus network that connects it with the capital and the surrounding municipalities.By road we can access Brunete via the M-600, M-513 and the Pantanos Highway. The municipality of Brunete also has the Los Madroños Hospital. Basic characteristics •225 m² built •6 rooms •3 bathrooms •Terrace •Parking space included in the price •Second hand/good condition •Built-in wardrobes •Storage room •North orientation •Built in 1990 •Individual heating: Natural gas Edifice •1st floor exterior equipment •Air-conditioning Energy certificate •Yeah. Call me to visit it, YOU WILL LOVE IT!

IDEHOGAR... FINANCING UP TO 100% sells SEMINUEVO apartment, EXTERIOR, next to the Plaza del Ayuntamiento in the FULL CENTER of Brunete. The house is distributed independently and is composed of three bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, two full bathrooms, one with a bathtub and the other with a shower, kitchen with drying terrace, living room with beautiful views of a park. The house has qualities such as oil central heating with radiators throughout the floor, built-in wardrobes, double glazed windows, oak doors and wooden floors. Two parking spaces and storage With all the services a few meters from the home such as pharmacies, supermarkets, schools, etc. For more information visit our website or our offices in Villanueva del Pardillo, Brunete, Majadahonda. Solvia sells duplexes for sale located in the urban area of Brunete, a quiet and familiar area with all the amenities you need at your fingertips. On the entrance floor you will find a guest toilet, a fully furnished kitchen and a large bright living room of more than 35m2, perfect to enjoy with family or friends. On the second floor you can enjoy a large bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, built-in wardrobes and a small dressing room, two bedrooms with built-in wardrobes (one currently used as an office) and an en-suite bathroom with a large bathtub. This apartment for sale has a constructed area of 130m2 and a useful area of 110m2, located on the first floor and facing southeast. In addition, you can enjoy visits available to know every detail of your future home. It is important to note that this apartment for sale does not have an elevator, but its characteristics and location make it a unique opportunity to live in a quiet area with all the amenities nearby.

Great duplex located in a quiet building in the center of Brunete, with all services at hand. It is a spacious house, in very good condition and built with quality materials and modern design. On the ground floor there is a good hall, a toilet, a kitchen with a utility room and a spacious living room with a gazebo. The attic floor is accessed by a designer metal staircase, upstairs there are two large bedrooms with good closets and a spacious bathroom. The whole house has a lot of light and faces the trees on the street, so the view is very private and pleasant. It has a magnificent garage and storage room in the building. It has natural gas heating, with a boiler on the clothesline, air conditioning, smooth paint, porcelain stoneware bathrooms, wooden flooring, armored entrance door...

Welcome to this wonderful property for sale! This home is located in a magnificent location, surrounded by nature and tranquility. It was renovated and renovated in 2021, so it is in perfect condition. to live comfortably. The rooms of the house are large and bright, with a very comfortable and cheerful layout, for all the moments of daily life. The kitchen, with more than thirty meters, is the true heart of the house and is fully equipped to enjoy gastronomy with family or friends. Located in a wonderful urbanization, the classic brick and stone structure was completely renovated inside. In addition, it has the possibility of living on a single floor, making it perfect for all types of families and lifestyles. The house is made up of two independent floors. On the upper floor there are 3 bedrooms and a storage area or attic with large capacity. The ground floor has a large living room with a fireplace and large windows that allow in natural light. The PVC carpentry with thermal bridge break and thermal and acoustic insulation guarantees a quiet and comfortable environment inside the home. The plot has access from a quiet street and a beautiful entrance porch. In addition, it has several entrances and exits to the rear area from the kitchen. The unobstructed access to the property and the parking area are details that make this house a perfect place to live. Don't miss the opportunity to acquire this wonderful home. Contact us through Idealista Chat and we will give you all the information you need. We will wait for you!

description: TECNOCASA BRUNETE sells EXCLUSIVELY a fantastic semi-detached house, it is located a few meters from the main street and has an excellent location. It is located a few meters from C/ Real de San Sebastián, which guarantees easy access to all the services available in the area. The house has 3 double bedrooms, one of which has an en-suite bathroom. All bedrooms have built-in wardrobes, which provides ample storage space, with three bathrooms. The kitchen is spacious and has access to a terrace, which allows you to enjoy the outdoors. There is also a storage room inside the house, which facilitates the storage and organization of personal items, on the other hand it consists of a spacious and very bright living room. The house also includes a garage, with direct access to the house. This provides convenience and security when entering and leaving the house, as there is no need to walk down the street to get to the car. In short, this semi-detached house in Brunete offers a privileged location, spacious rooms, a functional kitchen, a storage room, a garage and all the necessary services nearby.

Wonderful duplex with independent entrance to the house, in one of the best areas of Brunete. The entire house has double windows in all rooms and air conditioning. We manage home changes, free real estate valuation. 100% financing. Ask us conditions. 4-bedroom house for sale in the town of Brunete, province of Madrid. Located in a residential area with all services close to the access of the M-513 and M-501 highway that connect it in a few minutes with the M-50. The area is equipped with all types of equipment for daily use (schools, official centers, supermarkets, sports centers, etc. ) The house is located in a residential building built in 2000 with large green areas and a community pool. It has an area of 99 m² and consists of a living-dining room, kitchen, 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.

SABELA HOMES sells this fabulous independent villa in a gated community with pool and common areas. It is located in a very quiet area near the town center. DISTRIBUTION:. - Ground floor: Large entrance hall that leads to the different rooms that are found here. Large kitchen with office and pantry of good size. It communicates directly with the garage. Living room with fireplace and exit to private garden. Room on the ground floor that can be used as a bedroom. Bathroom with shower. - First floor. Three bedrooms and two full baths. The master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom with a shower and a hydromassage bath. In addition, exit to a very pleasant terrace. - Attic: Open space with the possibility of making two bedrooms and a bathroom, windows on the wall, so a lot of light enters. Also. It has a garage for one car with an automated door. The video intercom can be controlled from the mobile. Climalit windows, some sliding and others tilt-and-turn. It has a large private garden with renovated and recently arranged floors. WE DO NOT CHARGE FEES TO THE BUYER.

suggestedTexts: {'title': 'Detached house in Camino de las Caudalosas'}
description: At Remax Sorona, we offer you this gem in an urbanization surrounded by nature, where you will have all the comforts enjoying tranquility and comfort. On a beautiful large plot (2,576 meters. square) completely flat, and well-kept gardens with established trees, where the house is located, an independent garage plus a storage room and tools building. It also has a fantastic large swimming pool with a chill-out area, where you can enjoy the sun or nights by candlelight. The house is spacious and very comfortable, since it is built on one floor. We are welcomed by a large hall, which distributes to the living area, kitchen and rest area. The living room of more than 40 meters. square, it has a fireplace and lots of light, practically square where you can create different environments, with the warmth of a home. Very spacious kitchen with office area, with direct access to the garden through the terrace. It also has 4 double bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Porch at the entrance with a very large area to receive visitors. Detached garage for 2 cars. Don't miss this opportunity to enjoy nature!
